title: Memoirs of the life and writings of Thomas Chalmers...
author: Hanna, William
snippet: Mr. John Brown of Whitburn came in to tea ; I got him to stop all night with me.

title: Autobiography of the Rev. Dr Alexander Carlyle ;
author: Carlyle, Alexander
snippet: There was then not even a cottage nearer than the Kirk of Shotts, and Whitburn  itself was a solitary house in a desolate country.

title: Autobiography of the Rev. Dr Alexander Carlyle ;
author: Carlyle, Alexander
snippet: I walked to Whitburn at an early hour, but could venture  no further, as there was no tolerable lodginghouse  within my reach.
